title: Nikki Bella puts her toned fighter figure on show in crop top
text:
She may have retired from fighting this year.

But Nikki Bella showed off her still athletic figure in workout gear while out with her beau Artem Chignitsev in Los Angeles on Sunday.

The 35-year-old ex-wrestler flashed her chiseled midriff in a black crop top and slipped into a high-waisted pair of matching leggings.

Stepping out: Nikki Bella showed off her still athletic figure in workout gear while out with her beau Artem Chignitsev in Los Angeles on Sunday

She swept her dark hair back into an updo and accented her features with makeup, rounding off the look with flip flops.

Meanwhile, her Dancing With The Stars hunk buttoned on a powder blue denim shirt and slipped into a pair of fitted grey jeans.

The Russian dreamboat, who pushed along a full shopping cart as he and his girlfriend left Whole Foods, wore a pair of ultra-casual slippers.

Nikki was asked about a potential marriage to Artem when she was at the WWE Friday Night Smackdown 20th anniversary bash in Los Angeles on Friday.

Out and about: The 35-year-old ex-wrestler flashed her chiseled midriff in a black crop top and slipped into a high-waisted pair of matching leggings

While she said becoming Mrs. Chigntisev was 'not' completely out of the realm of possibility, she told E! News: 'Marriage and babies are really scary for me right now.'

Although Nikki and Artem were teamed up on Dancing With The Stars in 2017, she was then still carrying on her high-profile romance with John Cena.

After a swirl of dating rumors, Nikki finally revealed that she and Artem were 'boyfriend and girlfriend' on The Bellas Podcast in July.

Keeping it simple: She swept her dark hair back into an updo and accented her features with makeup, rounding off the look with flip flops

Nikki hostesses the podcast with her twin sister and fellow ex-pro wrestler Brie Bella, with whom she also co-stars on the reality show Total Bellas.

John, who still wrestles, has embarked on an acting career and also currently hosts Are You Smarter Than A 5th Grader? on Nickelodeon

Brie is also married to a professional wrestler, Daniel Bryan, with whom she shares a two-year-old daughter called Birdie.
description: She may have retired from fighting this year. But Nikki Bella showed off her still athletic figure in workout gear while out with her beau Artem Chignitsev in Los Angeles on Sunday.
